title: History of most popular typeface from the last decades
content:
I heard that today's most popular en therefore most used font is Calibri. Now I wonder if somebody remembers what were the most popular fonts during the nineties and the nillies? I guess it was first Times New Roman, followed by Georgia and now sans-serif Calibri (but this might be too much inspired by the history of one company: Microsoft).  
Did someone found some literature about this subject?
author: TypoDoctor
